Sample Metrics from YAML File

Sample Metrics from YAML File

sampleYAMLMetrics(yaml, ...)

# S4 method for list
sampleYAMLMetrics(yaml)

Arguments

yaml

Project summary YAML list.

Value

tibble.

See also

Other bcbio Utilities: prepareSummarizedExperiment, readDataVersions, readProgramVersions, sampleYAMLMetadata, sampleYAML

Examples

yaml <- readYAML("http://basejump.seq.cloud/project-summary.yaml")
#> Reading project-summary.yaml
sampleYAMLMetrics(yaml) %>% str()
#> 'data.frame':	4 obs. of  20 variables:
#>  $ sampleID                     : chr  "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"
#>  $ sampleName                   : chr  "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"
#>  $ description                  : chr  "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"
#>  $ xGC                          : num  48 48 47 48
#>  $ x53Bias                      : num  1.01 1.04 1 0.98
#>  $ averageInsertSize            : num  0 0 0 0
#>  $ duplicates                   : num  0 0 0 0
#>  $ duplicationRateOfMapped      : num  0.557 0.589 0.577 0.583
#>  $ exonicRate                   : num  0.859 0.882 0.863 0.871
#>  $ intergenicRate               : num  0.0663 0.0599 0.0661 0.0635
#>  $ intronicRate                 : num  0.0747 0.0581 0.0707 0.0652
#>  $ mappedPairedReads            : num  0 0 0 0
#>  $ mappedReads                  : num  22062337 25852621 25172084 25100941
#>  $ name                         : chr  "ctrl_f_1" "ctrl_f_4" "ko_f_1" "ko_f_6"
#>  $ qualityFormat                : chr  "standard" "standard" "standard" "standard"
#>  $ sequenceLength               : chr  "25-75" "25-75" "25-75" "25-75"
#>  $ sequencesFlaggedAsPoorQuality: num  0 0 0 0
#>  $ totalReads                   : num  22339941 26168288 25490090 25399483
#>  $ rrna                         : num  42219 48275 38894 40832
#>  $ rrnaRate                     : num  0.00207 0.00197 0.00167 0.00174
